channel.title: Mvp on Wes Shaddix
channel.description: Recent content in Mvp on Wes Shaddix

item.title: MVP Startup Checklist
item.description: This is the beginning of a series on trying to build a viable (profitable) startup from a side project that I have been wanting to do for a while. This post will serve as the initial brain dump and will ultimately be a table of contents for future blog posts on each step that I go through in order to serve as a guide for others that want to learn from my many mistakes that I’m sure I will make.
